entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet restore` fails to invalidate lock file and produce puzzling error messages #47771
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64]The Published Single File generated by "dotnet publish -c Release -r osx-arm64 /p:PublishSingleFile=true /p:IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract=true --self-contained" run failed on Mac OS #47760
  • Dotnet MSBuild: Get Property does not expand properties #47749

Closed

  • C# compiler misses CS8625: Cannot convert null literal to non-nullable reference type error in SDK 8.0.303 and newer #47765
  • Error after upgrading to 8.0.114 on ubuntu 24.04 #47735

PullRequests

Created

  • Try NetCore-Public-Test #47773
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove reassignments of `MSBuildAllTargets` property. #47772
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Open Test1.cs in Visual Studio, not MSTestSettings.cs #47768
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Consolidate output paths #47767
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47766
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add instance id to protocol with MTP #47764
    Area-dotnet test
  • Remove erroneous MicrosoftTestingPlatformVersion #47763
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Remove explicit WasmBootConfigFileName from tests #47759
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk, 10.0.1xx
  • dotnet CLI: Update commands folder names #47746
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • Adding guidance on what is considered a breaking change in the .NET SDK #45288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Decoupling Visual Studio and the .NET SDK #46477
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit versions for March #47710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid using AssetDetails, but FileLength and LastWriteTime directly on StaticWebAsset #47695
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Harden metadata handler invoker against bad metadata #47433
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove duplicate nuget packages from asset manifests baseline #47742
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update to AwesomeAssertions #47611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Linux-Bionic should build like Android, no rootfs #47739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run installer tests in pipeline #47313
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix dotnet format failure to handle slnx files #47508
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, DO NOT MERGE, Branch Lockdown
  • Remove `ForceDryRunSigning=true` on Mac & Linux signed builds #47461
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Adds incrementalism to DefineStaticWebAssets #47701
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Allow winforms binaries in the VMR #47745
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • simplify CreateTempSubdirectory #45633
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Process C# directives in file-based programs #47702
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Force OCI format for inner images when publishing tarballs or to local docker instances #47398
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers, Branch Lockdown, 8.0.16
  • Allow container targets to be loaded in more scenarios, even if the targets will be skipped #47693
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers, Branch Lockdown, 8.0.16
  • Use CDN Fixes #47503 #47712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .net10 p2 to p3 in the table #47724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
